TopicTitle: How do I bind buttons to Action Groups (specifically custom01) on console?

Articles.Content: I can’t seem to find where I go to bind console buttons to custom action groups, could someone tell me what to do?

You mean you are playing on a console (like X-Box or so)? Then I don't think this is a breaking-ground specific question, so I'd suggest to ask in the Technical Support (PlayStation 4, XBox One) subforum.

On PC you can set that in the settings menu under "Input" -> "Vessel"
